date_of_birth.customDisplay: {{velocity filter="indent"}}{{html wiki=false clean=false}} #set ($definedFormat = "$!object.xWikiClass.get($name).getProperty('dateFormat').value") #set($config = $xwiki.getDocument("${doc.space}.WebHome").getObject('ClinicalInformationCode.DBConfigurationClass')) #if ($config) #set ($format = "$!{config.getProperty('dateOfBirthFormat').value}") #end #if ("$!format" == '') #set ($format = $definedFormat) #end #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') #if ($format.indexOf('d') < 0) #if (!$value)#set($value = $util.date)#end #set ($date = $util.date) #if ($value) #set ($selMonth = $value.month) #set ($selYear= $value.year) #else #set ($selMonth = $date.month) #set ($selYear= $date.year) #end #set ($mFormat = $format.replaceAll("[^M]", '')) #set ($yFormat = $format.replaceAll("[^y]", '')) #set ($startYear = $date.year - 99) #set ($endYear = $date.year + 1) #else #end #else $!xwiki.formatDate($value, $format) #end {{/html}}{{/velocity}}
date_of_birth.name: date_of_birth

family_comments.name: family_comments
family_comments.prettyName: List health conditions found in family (describe the relationship with proband)

negative_phenotype.name: negative_phenotype
negative_phenotype.prettyName: Symptoms NOT observed in this patient

onset.customDisplay:
{{velocity}}{{html wiki=false clean=false}} #if ($value < 0) #set($congenital = true) #end #if ($value >= 0) #set ($y = $mathtool.div($value, 12)) #set ($m = $mathtool.mod($value, 12)) #end #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit')
or
#else #if ("$!value" == '') #set ($displayedValue = '-') #elseif ($congenital) #set ($displayedValue = 'Congenital') #else #set ($displayedValue = '') #if ($y != 1)#set ($ySuffix = 's')#end #if ($m != 1)#set ($mSuffix = 's')#end #if ($y > 0) #set ($displayedValue = "$y year$!{ySuffix} ") #end #set ($displayedValue = "$!displayedValue $m month$!{mSuffix} ") #end #end {{/html}}{{/velocity}}
onset.name: onset
